prompt: HELP! The building's on fire, my babies are inside the room but it's locked!
There's someone in my house. I can hear footsteps downstairs, and I’m hiding in the closet!
I've been in a car accident. My chest hurts, and I can’t feel my legs. Please send help!
I’m having a heart attack! My chest feels like it’s being crushed, and I’m sweating heavily!
There’s a man with a gun in the park! He’s pointing it at people and shouting!
My neighbor is screaming for help. I think they’re being attacked!
I can smell gas in my house, and I feel lightheaded! I’m scared it might explode!
My child has stopped breathing! They’re not moving, and I don’t know what to do!
I think my friend overdosed. They’re unconscious and not responding!
There’s a car speeding through the neighborhood, almost hitting pedestrians!
I was just mugged at gunpoint! The person ran away down Main Street!
A huge tree fell on my house, and I’m trapped inside! I can’t get out!
My elderly mother has fallen and can’t get up. She’s in a lot of pain!
I’m trapped in an elevator, and the doors won’t open. I think I’m stuck between floors!
Someone is breaking into cars in the parking lot! I can see them smashing windows!
There’s been a chemical spill at the factory! People are coughing and fainting!
A child is lost in the shopping mall. They’re crying and can’t find their parents!
There’s a motorcycle accident on Highway 24. The rider is lying on the road, not moving!
A man is standing on the bridge, threatening to jump! He looks very distressed!
My basement is flooding, and the water is rising fast. I’m afraid it will short out the electricity!
I saw a hit-and-run accident. The car drove off, and the victim is lying on the ground!
I’m lost in the woods, and it’s getting dark. My phone is running out of battery!
A tornado just hit my neighborhood! Houses are destroyed, and people are trapped!
There’s a domestic fight happening next door. I can hear things breaking and people shouting!
A biker just got hit by a truck on the highway. They’re bleeding and unconscious!
There’s a fire in the forest nearby, and it’s spreading quickly toward the houses!
A person collapsed in the gym while exercising. They’re not breathing and have no pulse!
My car broke down on the highway, and there are no lights or emergency lanes. I’m scared!
There’s a riot breaking out downtown. People are fighting, and things are being destroyed!
I think someone is stalking me. They’ve been following me for the past three blocks!
